entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to sever the feelers wrapping around Ron and yelling 'Diffindo!'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being wrapped by the feelers and thrashing against his bonds.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as screaming for help and being immobilized by her broken ankle on the floor.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as wheeling around and waving Hermione's wand at the oncoming Death Eaters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having a wand used by Neville.

relationships.description: Harry tries to sever the feelers wrapping around Ron.
Neville is attacking the Death Eaters with Hermione's wand.
